faq.what is tadaksahak: *Tadaksahak* is a language spoken by the *Idaksahak* community, a nomadic pastoralist people mainly located in the *northern regions of Mali* (particularly *MÃ©naka* and *Gao*), and also present in the eastern part of *Niger*.
